description: AI Capability Atlas Decision Engine - Optimized for 3-click maximum

root.question: What are you trying to do?
root.description: Start by choosing the most relevant high-level goal

options.label: Make a decision or solve a problem
Get practical help with daily tasks

cat_learn.question: What kind of learn or understand something task do you have?
cat_learn.description: Choose the type of learn or understand something work

capselect_learn_learn_new_things.question: What specific learn new things capability do you need?

cap_explain_complex_concepts.description: Breaking down complicated topics into understandable parts using analogies and simple language
cap_explain_complex_concepts.when_to_use: When learning something new, teaching others, or encountering unfamiliar terminology
thinking_prompts: What analogy would make this clearer?
How can I chunk this information?
What prior knowledge does my audience have?

cap_answer_factual_questions.description: Providing accurate information on specific topics
cap_answer_factual_questions.when_to_use: When you need quick facts, definitions, or specific information
thinking_prompts: How recent does this need to be?
What context might change the answer?

cap_compare_concepts.description: Highlighting similarities and differences between ideas, objects, or approaches
cap_compare_concepts.when_to_use: When deciding between options, understanding relationships, or clarifying distinctions

cap_provide_examples.description: Illustrating concepts with concrete instances to make abstract ideas tangible
cap_provide_examples.when_to_use: When learning abstract concepts, teaching others, or needing illustration for clarity

cap_translate_concepts.recommendation: Use the 'Translate concepts across domains' capability
cap_translate_concepts.description: Applying ideas from one field to another to deepen understanding or find new perspectives
cap_translate_concepts.when_to_use: When exploring interdisciplinary connections, making sense of unfamiliar fields, or finding novel insights
thinking_prompts: What does this resemble in another field?

cap_teach_step_by_step.description: Guiding through learning processes in sequential stages to build understanding progressively
cap_teach_step_by_step.when_to_use: When learning a new skill, procedure, or process that benefits from breaking into stages
thinking_prompts: What are the prerequisites for each step?

capselect_learn_research_analyze.question: What specific research & analyze capability do you need?

cap_summarize_long_texts.description: Condensing lengthy articles, reports, or documents into key points
cap_summarize_long_texts.when_to_use: When you're short on time or need to extract essential information
thinking_prompts: What are the main questions answered?
What would I tell someone in one minute?

cap_extract_key_points.description: Identifying and isolating the most important information from content
cap_extract_key_points.when_to_use: When you need to quickly grasp essential messages without reading full content
thinking_prompts: What can I skip without losing meaning?

cap_synthesize_multiple_sources.description: Combining information from different references into cohesive insights
cap_synthesize_multiple_sources.when_to_use: When you have gathered information from multiple places and need integrated understanding

cap_identify_themes.description: Recognizing recurring patterns, topics, or ideas across content
cap_identify_themes.when_to_use: When analyzing qualitative data, literature, or looking for patterns in information
thinking_prompts: What connects these seemingly different elements?

cap_analyze_arguments.description: Evaluating logical structure, evidence, and reasoning in persuasive content
cap_analyze_arguments.when_to_use: When assessing the strength of claims, understanding persuasion, or critical evaluation

cap_evaluate_credibility.description: Assessing reliability, trustworthiness, and authority of sources
cap_evaluate_credibility.when_to_use: When determining whether to trust information or sources

capselect_learn_evaluate_information.question: What specific evaluate information capability do you need?

cap_detect_bias.description: Identifying slanted perspectives, prejudice, or partiality in content
cap_detect_bias.when_to_use: When evaluating news, arguments, or representations that may be influenced by hidden assumptions

cap_verify_information.description: Checking accuracy and truthfulness of claims or data
cap_verify_information.when_to_use: When encountering surprising claims, important facts, or uncertain information
thinking_prompts: Is this too good/bad to be true?

cat_create.question: What kind of create something new task do you have?
cat_create.description: Choose the type of create something new work

capselect_create_create_things.question: What specific create things capability do you need?

cap_brainstorm_ideas.description: Generating creative concepts, angles, or approaches without initial judgment
cap_brainstorm_ideas.when_to_use: When starting a project, overcoming writer's block, or exploring possibilities

cap_create_outlines.description: Developing structured frameworks for projects, documents, or presentations
cap_create_outlines.when_to_use: When starting a complex task that needs organization and structure

cap_generate_stories.description: Creating narratives with plot, characters, and settings
cap_generate_stories.when_to_use: When writing fiction, creating content that needs narrative elements, or storytelling

cap_create_dialogue.description: Writing conversational exchanges between characters or for specific purposes
cap_create_dialogue.when_to_use: When writing scripts, novels, or any content with spoken interaction
thinking_prompts: How does conversation advance the story?

cap_develop_characters.description: Designing fictional personas with backstories, personalities, and traits
cap_develop_characters.when_to_use: When writing fiction, creating avatars, or developing person-based content

cap_design_scenarios.description: Inventing hypothetical situations for planning, training, or storytelling
cap_design_scenarios.when_to_use: When preparing for possibilities, creating exercises, or world-building

capselect_create_transform_content.question: What specific transform content capability do you need?

cap_translate_language.description: Converting text between languages while preserving meaning and tone
cap_translate_language.when_to_use: When communicating across languages or reaching multilingual audiences
thinking_prompts: How would this be said naturally?

cap_change_format.description: Converting content from one format to another (e.g., article to presentation)
cap_change_format.when_to_use: When repurposing content for different platforms or audiences
thinking_prompts: How can I preserve key ideas?

cat_decide.question: What kind of make a decision or solve a problem task do you have?
cat_decide.description: Choose the type of make a decision or solve a problem work

capselect_decide_make_decisions.question: What specific make decisions capability do you need?

cap_compare_options.description: Side-by-side evaluation of alternatives across relevant dimensions
cap_compare_options.when_to_use: When facing multiple choices and need systematic comparison

cap_evaluate_pros_cons.recommendation: Use the 'Evaluate pros and cons' capability
cap_evaluate_pros_cons.description: Listing advantages and disadvantages of each choice
cap_evaluate_pros_cons.when_to_use: When you need a clear picture of benefits and drawbacks

cap_weigh_trade_offs.description: Balancing competing benefits and costs in a decision
cap_weigh_trade_offs.when_to_use: When options involve compromises between desirable but incompatible outcomes
thinking_prompts: What am I gaining vs losing?

cap_prioritize_tasks.description: Ordering activities by importance, urgency, and impact
cap_prioritize_tasks.when_to_use: When you have more to do than time and need to decide what comes first

cap_apply_decision_frameworks.description: Using structured models (SWOT, cost-benefit, etc.) to guide choices
cap_apply_decision_frameworks.when_to_use: When facing important, complex decisions that benefit from structured analysis

cap_predict_outcomes.description: Forecasting likely results of decisions or actions
cap_predict_outcomes.when_to_use: When trying to anticipate consequences before making a choice

capselect_decide_solve_problems.question: What specific solve problems capability do you need?

cap_identify_root_causes.description: Finding underlying reasons for problems rather than treating symptoms
cap_identify_root_causes.when_to_use: When problems keep recurring or when you want lasting solutions

cap_generate_solutions.description: Creating potential fixes or improvements for identified problems
cap_generate_solutions.when_to_use: When you understand the problem and need options for addressing it
thinking_prompts: What would a fresh perspective suggest?

cap_evaluate_solutions.description: Assessing feasibility, effectiveness, and appropriateness of potential solutions
cap_evaluate_solutions.when_to_use: When you have multiple solution options and need to choose the best approach

cap_plan_implementation.description: Developing step-by-step action plans for chosen solutions
cap_plan_implementation.when_to_use: When you've decided on a solution and need to make it happen

cap_troubleshoot_issues.description: Diagnosing and resolving malfunctions, errors, or unexpected behaviors
cap_troubleshoot_issues.when_to_use: When something isn't working as expected and you need to fix it
thinking_prompts: What does this symptom tell me?

cap_optimize_systems.description: Improving efficiency and performance of processes, routines, or systems
cap_optimize_systems.when_to_use: When things work but could work better, faster, or with less effort

capselect_decide_analyze_systems.question: What specific analyze systems capability do you need?

cap_map_systems.description: Visualizing or describing how components of a system relate and interact
cap_map_systems.when_to_use: When trying to understand complex situations, organizations, or processes

cat_improve.question: What kind of improve or refine existing work task do you have?
cat_improve.description: Choose the type of improve or refine existing work work

capselect_improve_improve_work.question: What specific improve or refine existing work capability do you need?
capselect_improve_improve_work.description: Capabilities for Improve or refine existing work

cap_improve_clarity.description: Making text more understandable, direct, and unambiguous
cap_improve_clarity.when_to_use: When your writing feels confusing, wordy, or unclear
thinking_prompts: What am I actually trying to say?

cap_improve_conciseness.description: Removing unnecessary words while preserving meaning
cap_improve_conciseness.when_to_use: When text is too long, wordy, or meandering

cap_improve_tone.description: Adjusting language to match desired emotional impact or formality level
cap_improve_tone.when_to_use: When the tone doesn't match the intended audience, purpose, or context
thinking_prompts: How do I want readers to feel?
Is this too formal or casual?

cap_improve_structure.description: Reorganizing content for better flow, logic, and readability
cap_improve_structure.when_to_use: When ideas are jumbled, transitions are missing, or organization is weak

cap_improve_grammar_spelling.recommendation: Use the 'Improve grammar and spelling' capability
cap_improve_grammar_spelling.description: Correcting language errors, typos, and mechanical issues
cap_improve_grammar_spelling.when_to_use: When text contains errors that undermine credibility or distract from meaning
thinking_prompts: What rules am I unsure about?

cap_adapt_for_audience.description: Tailoring content to specific reader groups or contexts
cap_adapt_for_audience.when_to_use: When content needs to speak effectively to a particular audience

cat_practical.question: What kind of get practical help with daily tasks task do you have?
cat_practical.description: Choose the type of get practical help with daily tasks work

capselect_practical_practical_skills.question: What specific get practical help with daily tasks capability do you need?
capselect_practical_practical_skills.description: Capabilities for Get practical help with daily tasks

cap_cooking_recipes.description: Providing ingredient lists and preparation steps for meals
cap_cooking_recipes.when_to_use: When planning meals, learning to cook, or looking for cooking inspiration
thinking_prompts: What do I want to eat?
How much time do I have?

cap_diy_instructions.description: Guiding through home improvement, crafting, or repair projects
cap_diy_instructions.when_to_use: When tackling hands-on projects, making things, or fixing items

cap_budget_planning.description: Helping allocate finances and track expenses
cap_budget_planning.when_to_use: When managing money, saving for goals, or controlling spending

cat_entertain.question: What kind of have fun or be entertained task do you have?
cat_entertain.description: Choose the type of have fun or be entertained work

capselect_entertain_entertainment_leisur.question: What specific have fun or be entertained capability do you need?
capselect_entertain_entertainment_leisur.description: Capabilities for Have fun or be entertained

cap_tell_stories.description: Narrating fictional or personalized tales for entertainment
cap_tell_stories.when_to_use: When you want to be entertained, practice storytelling, or enjoy creative narratives

cap_generate_jokes.description: Creating humorous one-liners, puns, or funny content
cap_generate_jokes.when_to_use: When you want to lighten the mood, practice humor, or entertain yourself

cap_suggest_games.description: Recommending play activities, board games, or party games
cap_suggest_games.when_to_use: When you're looking for entertainment activities for yourself or groups

cat_personal.question: What kind of work on personal development task do you have?
cat_personal.description: Choose the type of work on personal development work

capselect_personal_personal_wellness.question: What specific work on personal development capability do you need?
capselect_personal_personal_wellness.description: Capabilities for Work on personal development

cap_provide_health_information.description: Offering general knowledge about medical conditions, wellness, and healthy habits
cap_provide_health_information.when_to_use: When seeking to understand health topics or improve well-being (not for medical emergencies)
thinking_prompts: What do I need to know?
What should I check with a doctor?

cap_suggest_exercises.description: Recommending physical activities for fitness goals and ability levels
cap_suggest_exercises.when_to_use: When starting or varying a fitness routine, or targeting specific goals

cap_mental_health_support.description: Providing coping strategies, mindfulness techniques, and emotional support resources
cap_mental_health_support.when_to_use: When dealing with stress, anxiety, or seeking to improve mental well-being (not for crises)

cap_habit_formation.description: Designing routines and strategies to build and maintain new positive behaviors
cap_habit_formation.when_to_use: When trying to create lasting changes in daily life or behavior

cap_goal_setting.description: Helping define, plan, and achieve personal objectives
cap_goal_setting.when_to_use: When you want to accomplish something but need structure and planning

cat_communicate.question: What kind of communicate or interact with others task do you have?
cat_communicate.description: Choose the type of communicate or interact with others work

capselect_communicate_social_emotional.question: What specific communicate or interact with others capability do you need?
capselect_communicate_social_emotional.description: Capabilities for Communicate or interact with others

cap_draft_messages.description: Composing emails, texts, or social media communications
cap_draft_messages.when_to_use: When sending digital communications and want to strike the right tone
thinking_prompts: What do I need to include?

cap_respond_to_messages.when_to_use: When you've received a message and need to craft an appropriate response
thinking_prompts: What do I want to convey?

cap_practice_conversations.description: Simulating dialogues for skill development or preparation
cap_practice_conversations.when_to_use: When preparing for difficult conversations, practicing social skills, or rehearsing interactions
thinking_prompts: What do I want to say?

guided_discovery.question: What's your current situation or interest?
guided_discovery.description: Choose the statement that best describes what you're looking for

options.label: I'm curious about a topic and want to understand it better
I need to make a decision or choose between options
I want to create something new (writing, ideas, stories)
I want to improve something I've already written or created
I need to solve a problem or fix something that's not working
I need help with a practical daily task (cooking, DIY, budgeting)
I want to have fun or be entertained
I want to work on personal growth or wellness
I need help communicating with others
I just want to explore all capabilities
